verses: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks,
thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the
, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
Lift not up your horn on high: speak
neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
For in the hand of the
, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring
But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
of the wicked also will I cut off;
the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
